name: Taylor Swift
description: An American singer-songwriter known for her narrative songwriting and evolving musical styles, ranging from country to pop and indie folk.

name: Adele
description: An English singer-songwriter known for her powerful vocals and deeply emotional ballads, often centered around themes of heartbreak and relationships.

name: Drake
description: A Canadian rapper, singer, and actor known for blending rap and R&B, with themes often focused on fame, relationships, and success.

name: Beyonc√©
description: An American singer, songwriter, and actress known for her powerhouse vocals, stage presence, and cultural impact.

name: Ed Sheeran
description: An English singer-songwriter known for his acoustic pop and soulful voice, often centered on love and personal experiences.

name: Rihanna
description: A Barbadian singer, songwriter, and businesswoman known for her versatility across genres such as pop, R&B, and reggae.

name: Billie Eilish
description: An American singer-songwriter known for her distinctive vocal style and dark, avant-pop music, capturing themes of melancholy and introspection.

name: The Weeknd
description: A Canadian singer-songwriter and record producer known for his genre-blending style of pop, R&B, and alternative, often exploring themes of hedonism and melancholy.

name: Lady Gaga
description: An American singer, songwriter, and actress known for her flamboyant stage presence, genre versatility, and social activism.

name: Bruno Mars
description: An American singer-songwriter and record producer known for his wide vocal range and blending of pop, funk, R&B, and soul genres.

name: Kendrick Lamar
description: An American rapper, songwriter, and record producer known for his socially conscious lyrics and narrative-driven hip-hop.

name: Ariana Grande
description: An American singer, songwriter, and actress known for her powerful vocals and wide vocal range, often blending pop and R&B styles.

name: Katy Perry
description: An American singer-songwriter known for her upbeat pop anthems, colorful performances, and chart-topping hits.

name: Post Malone
description: An American rapper, singer, and songwriter known for his unique blend of hip-hop, R&B, and rock influences.

name: Shawn Mendes
description: A Canadian singer-songwriter known for his soulful pop ballads and acoustic guitar-driven sound.

name: Travis Scott
description: An American rapper, singer, and record producer known for his eclectic production style and auto-tuned vocal delivery, often focusing on trap and psychedelic music.

name: Lizzo
description: An American singer, rapper, and flutist known for her empowering songs, body positivity messages, and energetic performances.

name: Harry Styles
description: An English singer, songwriter, and actor known for his versatile sound and fashion-forward image, formerly a member of the boy band One Direction.

name: Dua Lipa
description: An English singer and songwriter known for her distinctive vocal style, blending pop with electronic and dance music.

name: SZA
description: An American singer-songwriter known for her soulful voice and eclectic mix of R&B, hip-hop, and neo-soul, often focusing on themes of self-discovery and empowerment.
